pullrequest.title: Update inertia properties during simulation: part 2

content.raw:
Did you take the first equation from somewhere or did you derive it? Rusty physics here... 

I searched a bit and found [this](http://www.solitaryroad.com/c375/ole79.gif) image which suggests it should be `Ix = m/12 (4*(2L)^2 + (L/5)^2))`. But I have as much reason to believe it as to believe your notebook :)
content.html:
Did you take the first equation from somewhere or did you derive it? Rusty physics here...

I searched a bit and found this image which suggests it should be Ix = m/12 (4*(2L)^2 + (L/5)^2)). But I have as much reason to believe it as to believe your notebook :)
